title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Feb 17 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Feb 17 2022
description:
Sean Hannity joins Clay and Buck to talk about his decades'-long warm friendship with Rush and the enduring legacy of Radio's Greatest of All Time. Sean's ability as a great storyteller comes through as he shares heartfelt memories of his spectacularly talented and caring friend. Callers share their memories of Rush, including one who took time now to visit Rush in Missouri. Rush predicted the covid madness we've witnessed over the last year. Governor Youngkin bans school mask mandates in Virginia. Rush on endless covid panic resembling climate change. Joy Behar: It's not 100% safe yet and says she will most likely wear masks indefinitely. Comedian Tyler Fischer mocks Fauci.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
